entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
